fields.name: Special Offers
fields.friendly_name: Special offers, Deals, Promotions and Clearance items

fields.name: Motorskills
fields.description:
This Courses has been created to help children develop fine motor skills.
In the this course Children will receive a set of blocks and a booklet that has images of to create different structures, 
This course has been adapted for ages from 3-10 years so skills can be developed over a longer period of time.

fields.name: Safety
fields.description: This Course was designed to help new families or educators understand the importance of safety training.In this course you will be trained in first aid and how to handle situations that may be life threatening to ensure the safety of the children involved

fields.name: Nutrition
fields.description: This is a simple guide into understanding why nutrition is important and how to create a simple yet effective way incorporate these aspects in everyday living for the children and family.
